title: Esto es tan genial como espeluznante: embrace the  IA

embed.description: What if mobiles devices had a robotic limb? This research project explores mobile augmentation with a robotic extension. MobiLimb is a new shape-changing component with a compact form factor that can be deployed on mobile devices. It is a small 5 DoF serial robotic manipulator that can be easily added to (or removed from) existing mobile devices (smartphone, tablet).

replies.body: Al fin un metodo para dejar en automatico los juevos idle.
